description: Detects a file or folder's permissions being modified. Author: Jakob Weinzettl, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Users interacting with the files on their own (unlikely unless privileged users).
name: File or Folder Permissions Modifications
query: ((process.executable:(*\\takeown.exe OR *\\cacls.exe OR *\\icacls.exe) AND process.command_line:*\/grant*) OR (process.executable:*\\attrib.exe AND process.command_line:*\-r*))
